alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central New Hanover County through 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms between Silver Lake and Carolina Beach. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Masonboro Island, Myrtle Grove, Silver Lake, Sea Breeze, and Seagate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, then seek shelter inside a building until the storms exit the area.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Inland New Hanover
